short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HaHa isn't just a regular wallet. We provide the tools that help you stay informed and degen on the go.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an early release. We are adding more features in later stages.

Be a Smarter Investor:

- Buy, send, spend & exchange your digital assets.
- Track your coins.
- Track your NFTs.
- Connect to the decentralized web with built in scam protection.

- Monad devnet supported.
- Ethereum, Polygon, Base, BNB, Arbitrum, and Avalanche networks supported.
- Base Sepolia, Sepolia, and Polygon Amoy Testnet networks supported.
